lead_paragraph: After a week of being at the epicenter of the college football world, Rose Bowl officials will try to complete plans for a $164 million renovation of the stadium.
snippet: After a week of being at the epicenter of the college football world, Rose Bowl officials will try to complete plans for a $164 million renovation of the stadium.

headline.main: Rose Bowl Hopes to Bet Future on a Makeover
headline.seo: Rose Bowl Hopes to Bet Its Future on a Makeover
